content.description: Which of the following versions of sentence 3 (reproduced below) would both engage the audience’s interest and provide the most effective introduction to the main topic of the passage?
content.question: Does any other writer even come close?

choices.label: But was Shakespeare actually the author of these works?
Who hasn’t at least heard of the great William Shakespeare?
Would anyone think Shakespeare tried to pass his work off as someone else’s?

content.answer: But was Shakespeare actually the author of these works?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
